explanation: [0-0] On a gravel road, a soldier in camouflage uniform is preparing to fire a mortar. Other soldiers around are crouching on the ground and observing. There is a white caption at the top of the screen that reads: MORTARS BUT THEY KEEP GETTING BIGGER.
